name: SUPERTYPER
description:
[ ABOUT ]

A small typing game for Windows made under a week with the Godot Engine.

Inspired by Typespeed.

Current game version: < 0.1.0 >

TIP: Press ENTER or SPACEBAR to enter the text

[ FEATURES ]
  • 3 Game modes;
  • 5 Different color schemes;
  • Thousands of words from 2 to 15 characters;
